snippet: A rare open house in London allows visitors a peek into the Herbarium at Kew Gardens, a vast collection of plant specimens and other treasures, some from Darwin and Livingstone, others more recent.
abstract: Open House London event provides visitors with rare opportunity to peek into Herbarium at Kew Gardens, vast collection of plant specimens and other treasures located next to popular botanic garden; herbarium, visited each week by scores of researchers from around the world, is usually closed to tourists.
lead_paragraph: A rare open house in London allows visitors a peek into the Herbarium at Kew Gardens, a vast collection of plant specimens and other treasures, some from Darwin and Livingstone, others more recent.

headline.seo: A Rare Open House Lets Visitors in the Herbarium at Kew Gardens
headline.main: Nature Overflows in These Musty Rooms
headline.print_headline: Nature Overflows in These Musty Rooms
